page.description: Alpha Anywhere ships with sample and tutorial workspaces that can be installed.

section.note: Sample and Tutorial Workspaces may not be as up-to-date as other tutorials available in our [Getting Started Tutorials].

section.title: How to Install a Sample Workspace
section.description: Sample and Tutorial Workspaces must first be installed before you can use them.

description.p: Open the *[ui:Select Workspace]* dialog. The *[ui:Select Workspace]* dialog opens automatically when Alpha Anywhere is launched.

If *[ui:Select Workspace]* dialog does not appear when you launch Alpha Anywhere or Alpha Anywhere is already running, you can click the *[ui:Recent Workspaces]* button on the toolbar to open the *[ui:Select Workspace]* dialog.

step.note: All open workspaces must first be closed before the *[ui:Recent Workspaces]* option appears on the toolbar.

figure.title: Click Recent Workspaces in the toolbar after closing all open workspaces to open the Select Workspace dialog

step.description: Make sure the *[ui:Web/Mobile]* checkbox is checked. This ensures all sample and tutorial applications for mobile and web applications will be listed.
In the *[ui:Select Workspace]* dialog, click *[ui:Sample and Tutorial Workspaces]* to show a list of all available Sample Applications.
Select the sample or tutorial workspace you wish to install, specify the installation folder, and click *[ui:OK]* to install the workspace.

section.title: Available Web and Mobile Sample Workspaces
section.description: There are several web and mobile application sample and tutorial applications that ship with Alpha Anywhere. Each sample workspace is described below.

case.title: Application Server Demo
case.description: Learn how to build powerful applications using Alpha Anywhere's Web Component Builders and the Alpha Application Web Server.

case.title: Demo Mobile Application
case.description: This sample application demonstrates how to building a mobile business application that works against the sample Northwind database. The instructions for this tutorial can be found in our Getting Started Tutorials. Check out [Building the Sample Mobile Application] to get started.

case.title: Email Features Demo
case.description: Learn how to automate email tasks, including populating tables in a database with the contents of an email.

case.title: Learning Xbasic
case.description: This workspace is the sample 'Phone Messages' database used as part of the Learning Xbasic tutorial.

case.title: Simple Web Contact Manager
case.description: The Simple Web Contact Manager demonstrates how to build a simple web-based contact manager using Alpha Anywhere's Web Component Builders.

case.title: AlphaSports
case.description: The AlphaSports sample application shows you how to build a full featured application for the fictitious AlphaSports company. It includes sample reports that can be used in web applications.
